title: The Jaguar Warrior
description: The growing Aztec capital is unhappy under the stern rule of their Tepanec overlords. Having tried every political trick, Acamapichtli, the wise and vigorous ruler of the Aztecs, is about to seek an unusual solution. When the delegation of the Tepanec elite warriors arrives at his island-city in order to enlist a force of the Aztec warriors, he seizes his chance, unleashing a series of adventures for out Tepanec heroes.
author: Zoe Saadia
